# Aspire-Full Knowledge Graph

> A comprehensive map of the Aspire-Full solution for AI Agents.

## Core Architecture

| Project | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Aspire-Full** | The AppHost orchestrator. Defines the distributed application model. |
| **Aspire-Full.ServiceDefaults** | Shared configuration for OpenTelemetry, HealthChecks, and Service Discovery. |
| **Aspire-Full.Shared** | **CRITICAL**: Contains all DTOs, Enums, and shared business logic. All data contracts live here. |
| **Aspire-Full.Api** | The primary backend API. Uses EF Core 10 and PostgreSQL. |
| **Aspire-Full.Web** | The React 19 frontend application. |
| **Aspire-Full.Gateway** | YARP-based API Gateway. Handles routing and load balancing. |

## AI & Compute

| Project | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Aspire-Full.Agents** | Orchestration layer for AI Agents. |
| **Aspire-Full.Subagents** | Specialized sub-agents for specific tasks. |
| **Aspire-Full.Tensor** | **High-Performance**: Hybrid C#/.NET 10 + CUDA C++ for tensor operations. |
| **Aspire-Full.Embeddings** | Service for generating vector embeddings (ONNX/Torch). |
| **Aspire-Full.VectorStore** | Abstraction layer for vector databases. |
| **Aspire-Full.Qdrant** | Qdrant implementation of the VectorStore. |
| **Aspire-Full.Python** | Python interop layer for running Python scripts/models. |

## Infrastructure & Tooling

| Project | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Aspire-Full.DevContainer** | Configuration for the development container environment. |
| **Aspire-Full.DockerRegistry** | Manages local Docker registry and image builds. |
| **Aspire-Full.Github** | GitHub API integration and tooling. |
| **Aspire-Full.Pipeline** | CI/CD pipeline definitions and automation. |
| **Aspire-Full.WebAssembly** | Blazor WebAssembly components (if applicable). |

## Testing

| Project | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Aspire-Full.Tests.Unit** | xUnit tests for core logic. |
| **Aspire-Full.Tests.E2E** | End-to-End tests using Playwright/Aspire Test Host. |
| **Aspire-Full.Gateway.Tests.*** | Specialized tests for the Gateway (Unit, Integration, Engine). |

## Key Technologies

- **.NET 10**: The runtime for all managed code.
- **Aspire 13.0.1**: Orchestration.
- **CUDA 12+**: GPU acceleration for `Aspire-Full.Tensor`.
- **PostgreSQL**: Primary relational database.
- **Qdrant**: Vector database.
- **React 19**: Frontend framework.

## Development Rules

1.  **DTOs**: Always check `Aspire-Full.Shared` before creating new models.
2.  **Native Code**: `Aspire-Full.Tensor/Native` contains C++ CUDA code. Build with `docker buildx bake`.
3.  **Documentation**: All public APIs must have XML documentation.
